content: I found a major bug in the IG publisher this morning. I've hacked it a little so it works for 3.0.1 implementation guides, but publishing all implementation guides for R2 and 1.6 is broken right now. I'll hopefully have time to fix in about 20 hours time
also, for anyone working on 3.2.0 implementation guides you'll have to edit any extension definitions you have manually created for new changes to structure definition (building now)
no changes needed if you edited them in forge or use spreadsheets
@Grahame Grieve is this the issue or something related ? http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base/build.log this is 3.0.1 IG build
yes I'm hoping to get to it anytime soon. Sorry - it's just impossible for to get time to do anything more than answer emails right now
Hi I am getting STU4 elements isModifierReason, valueSetCanonical... in my 3.0.1 IG build definition.xml.zip artefacts have I missed something or is this a problem?
@Grahame Grieve did I miss something in build config? was not expecting any STU4 content...
